overview: Titan FC 24: Johnson vs. Jones was an MMA event that took place on August 24, 2012 at Memorial Hall in Kansas City. It features the light heavyweight debut of longtime welterweight Anthony “Rumble” Johnson in the main event against Esteves Jones. The co-main event features the highly anticipated MMA debut of World Jiu-Jitsu Champion Braulio Estima in a welterweight clash with Chris “The Hammer” Holland.
title: Titan FC 24: Johnson vs. Jones
